mutants.code:
def length_of_longest_substring(s, k):
    n = len(s)
    if k == 0 and n == 0:
        return 0
    (left, right) = (0, 0)
    hashmap = dict()
    max_length = 1
    while right < n:
        hashmap[s[right]] = right
        right += 1
        if len(hashmap) == k + 1:
            del_idx = min(hashmap.values())
            del hashmap[s[del_idx]]
            left = del_idx + 1
        max_length = max(max_length, right - left)
    return max_length

def length_of_longest_substring(s, k):
    n = len(s)
    if k == 0 or n == 0:
        return 0
    (left, right) = (0, 0)
    hashmap = dict()

    while right < n:
        hashmap[s[right]] = right
        right += 1
        if len(hashmap) == k + 1:
            del_idx = min(hashmap.values())
            del hashmap[s[del_idx]]
            left = del_idx + 1
        max_length = max(max_length, right - left)
    return max_length
